# PLAYER::GET_PLAYER_TARGET_ENTITY

## Summary
Returns TRUE if the player is locked on to a valid entity

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player
* **ENTITY_INDEX\*** entity: _INDEX of the target aimed at by the specified player will be returned by reference via EntityIndex

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Assigns the handle of locked-on melee target to *entity that you pass it.
Returns false if no entity found.
